subject: Marathon Running
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: From 1975 to 1980, Bill Rodgers won the Boston Marathon four times, and he won four consecutive New York City Marathons from 1976 to 1979.
snippet: From 1975 to 1980, Bill Rodgers won the Boston Marathon four times, and he won four consecutive New York City Marathons from 1976 to 1979.
